title: Microsoft Excel 4.0 for Windows: intermediate and advanced skills
brief_description: Narrated by Sheila Swanson, this is a step-by-step guide showing how to perform advanced functions in Excel 4.0 for Windows. Skills learned include: how to create charts using Chartwizard, enhancing charts, giving your spreadsheet that professional touch, formatting using chart windows, customising the toolbar, creating and running macros, linking single cells, linking a range of cells and creating dynamic data links.
